Class MovingRobot

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Entity
model.Enemy
model.MovingRobot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MovingRobot extends Enemy
Represents a mobile enemy robot that patrols an area. This class extends the base Enemy and uses a MovingRobotBehavior to define its AI, which includes walking, turning at edges, and attacking the player.
See Also:
